messages.content: Which building is the tallest in the world

As of my knowledge cutoff date of September 2021, the Burj Khalifa in Dubai, United Arab Emirates is the tallest building in the world. It stands at 828 meters (2,747 feet) and was completed in 2010. It was designed by the American architectural firm Skidmore, Owings & Merrill and was built by the construction company Al-Fara'a Group, with the help of over 22,000 workers from around the world. The Burj Khalifa is a mixed-use building that contains offices, residential units, and a hotel. It is an iconic symbol of modern Dubai, and it has become a popular tourist attraction.
